meanings.definition: Relating to or situated between oceans.
meanings.sent1: The interoceanic voyage was long but exciting.
meanings.sent2: The interoceanic cable connected the two vast bodies of water.
meanings.sent3: The interoceanic view from the top of the hill was breathtaking.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held an interoceanic depth, reflecting the vastness of the seas.
meanings.sent5: The interoceanic horizon seemed to stretch endlessly, merging the two great waters.

meanings.sent1: The interoceanic bridge was a marvel of engineering.
meanings.sent2: The interoceanic tunnel allowed ships to pass between the oceans.
meanings.sent3: The interoceanic ferry ride was surprisingly smooth.
meanings.sent4: His interoceanic journey symbolized unity between the vast bodies of water.
meanings.sent5: The interoceanic path was marked by the meeting of two great tides.
